summary: Initializes the NeMo Lightning package by re-exporting core training components such as the Trainer, Megatron strategy, data samplers, mixed‑precision plugins, and utilities for vocabulary size and teardown, while also providing a helper to detect interactive SLURM environments.
business_intent: Offer a streamlined, high‑level API for users to set up and run distributed training jobs with NeMo Lightning, especially leveraging Megatron models and SLURM cluster environments.
